page.title: 11Chard Industry 2
page.content: {Phoenix Engineering}are renowned for their welding skills and manufacture road construction machinery for local authorities and contractors throughout Britain. The Snowdon Collar Works is one of the few remaining links with Chard's past glory as a textile town.Under the title of{L.S.&J.Sussman,}high quality shirts are made and exported world wide.One of their products,a pure silk designer created shirt,sells for Â£120. {Smith & Jones Joinery}uses part of the old Dening's factory mentioned previously and make a variety of wood mouldings to order such as hardwood window frames and staircases. At the village of{Nimmer}the mill is still used as a factory for making luxury shaving and hair brushes from badger hair and ivory.
